main event: A sighting of a round white object with a greenish-blue trail was reported on March 19, 1959, approximately 24 miles north of Mex, North Dakota.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 seconds,The object was initially seen at a 35-degree angle and later at a 25-degree angle,Before the object disappeared into the cloud, it emitted a flash which could have been a reflection,Weather conditions included clouds to the north and visibility over 15 miles,The observer stated that the UFO did not appear to be a meteor even though one had been sighted earlier.
sighted object: round white object with greenish-blue trail
witness description: A military observer stationed at a nearby air force base
